review_data.title: very good
review_data.content: The tram was fantastic you could get on and off when you wanted. you buy a 24 hour pass that covers trains trams and buses to. Trams run every couple on mins

review_data.title: Apero Tram
review_data.content: We had a wonderful time on the Apero Tram celebrating my husband's 40th birthday along with our two daughters, age 4 & 6 years old. The tram circles around Zurich several times while you enjoy a beer or glass of wine along with 3 or...More
